{{summary?.nric | uppercase | defaultString}} {{summary?.rank | uppercase | defaultString}} {{summary?.name | defaultString}}
NSman ({{summary?.sex}}) CAB:{{summary.cabInd | defaultString}} Protected Payable:{{summary.protectedPayableInd | defaultString}}
Outstanding Principal:{{summary.principalOS | currency:'SGD' : '' | defaultString}} Outstanding Interest:{{summary.interestOS | currency:'SGD' : '' | defaultString}} Instalment:{{summary.instalmentInd | currency:'SGD' : '' | defaultString}}
{{summary?.csn.substring(0,10) | uppercase | defaultString}}-{{summary?.csn.substring(10,13) | uppercase | defaultString}}-{{summary?.csn.substring(13,15) | uppercase | defaultString}} {{summary?.name | defaultString}}
{{summary?.directInd | defaultString }} CAB:{{summary.cabInd | defaultString}}
Outstanding Principal:{{summary.principalOS | currency:'SGD' : '' | defaultString}}
import {HttpResponse} from '@angular/common/http'; import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {IOPSummary} from '../overpayment-info/overpayment-info.model'; import {PaymentService} from '../service/payment.service'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-particulars', templateUrl: './particulars.component.html', styleUrls: ['./particulars.component.scss'] }) export class ParticularsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() isNSman = true; @Input() selectedId = ""; summary: IOPSummary = { nric: '', name: '', rank: '', sex: '', csn: '' }; constructor( private paymentService: PaymentService ) {}; ngOnInit(): void { this.loadSummary(); } loadSummary(): void { if(this.isNSman) { setTimeout(() => { this.paymentService.getSummaryByNric(this.selectedId).subscribe( (res: HttpResponse) => { const data: IOPSummary = res.body.data; this.summary = data; } ); },1000); } else { setTimeout(() => { this.paymentService.getSummaryByCsn(this.selectedId).subscribe( (res: HttpResponse) => { const data: IOPSummary = res.body.data; this.summary = data; } ); },1000); } } }
